reviews.text: Had never tried soho until recently. Gave this recipe a mix and it's absolutely wonderful. Mixed at 60/40 very good I must say.
I like this one so much that I have to say it in Italian: spettacolare!! Mix it. Now.
Keeps getting better and better with a steep. Crazy this was your first try. The tobacco in this is amazing.

I replaced stark apple with inw shisha apple. Had to replace FA caramel with FW salted caramel because I just did not have them, but WOW this is a great vape. I'm down to only 15 mls left so the depression started to set in,so I just made 2 more 30mls so I can vape it all weekend. Great recipe Matt!
